samples.prompt:
Human:How do you prevent tooth enamel loss?Assistant:Tooth enamel loss is a common condition that affects most people’s teeth at some point in their life. Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

How to prevent enamel loss

To prevent enamel loss, you can take steps to reduce the amount of acid that your teeth come into contact withHuman:Should I brush more often?Assistant:Yes, you should brush your teeth twice a day, at least, with toothpaste that contains fluoride. In fact, studies have shown that toothbrush users who are aged 5 or older can reduce their risks of cavities by about half if they brush their teeth two or more times a day and with the right toothpaste. Fluoride helps protect the outer enamel layer of your teeth by strengthening the material.Human:Thanks, I will get a toothpaste that includes fluoride.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Great! You could also visit your dentist to have your teeth checked. If you can afford it, the dentist may also offer dental treatment to improve your enamel, or prevent cavities, such as a fluoride treatment, a filling, or perhaps a tooth extraction. It’s important to discuss treatment options with your dentist and remember that prevention is often more effective than relying on dental treatment.
samples.policy: You’re welcome. Remember, it’s also a good idea to floss daily to help remove plaque and food particles from your teeth and gums. And, when you are able to, rinse your mouth with a solution of 1 tablespoon of baking soda and 1 tablespoon of water (and mouthwash if you want to make it more effective), for about 30 seconds, after you brush.

samples.chosen: If you're talking about the type of work that entails writing and inputting details using the computer, your friend is in luck. It is an in demand field, even for paraplegics. Many employers also tend to have flexible working hours so it might be easier for him to work with a remote worker. He could also take up jobs like web designing, social media marketing and digital marketing, etc. Again, it doesn’t have to be for a company, but also self-employed type jobs that a paraplegic can do are available.
samples.policy:
Thanks for your question. I'm glad to help. Paraplegic individuals may have some difficulty accessing certain jobs, and some can't physically go to office jobs. If he can work from home, he should be able to use many different devices to access data, and there are a number of ways he can work for companies who need data entry work. A few types of data entry jobs for paraplegics to consider might include:

1. OCR for email messages or documents
2. Optical character recognition (OCR) for images on the web
3. Data entry from screen recordings, webcam streams or video files

Most of these tasks can be done by computer software that can recognize text or images from screen content. Companies are willing to pay a fair amount for data entry work, as there are many people who can do the work if they have the necessary software, and who can help them learn a new program. It's possible that he could use his daughter's school to try to find opportunities, but it would probably be more successful if he found companies that hire paraplegics and worked remotely. Some companies may offer a salary for this work, while others will just offer the opportunity to work remotely, and may hire him for other tasks in addition. I would suggest that he also research companies online and ask for referrals. You can also check with local paratransit programs, as paraplegics may use these services to get around.

samples.prompt: Human:My daughter has been asking for fish as pets for a long time. Can you suggest me any breeds that do especially well with children?Assistant:
samples.chosen: A fish would definitely be a pretty simple pet for a young child to care for, and many breeds are well-suited to children. The key factors to keep in mind are that they need to be low-maintenance and stay healthy. For fish, “low-maintenance” basically just means that they should be relatively easy to keep alive. “Healthy” means that the fish should be genetically sound and have a healthy immune system. This should be relatively easy to determine by doing a search on the fish’s breed and reviewing their health history. The only other suggestion I’d make is that you shouldn’t get a fish that’s particularly expensive, since that will make the experience more stressful if it dies. I hope that helps!
samples.policy: There are several breeds of fish that are well-suited for children. Among the more popular options are goldfish, darters, and platys. Some types of these fish are especially gentle and can be more approachable than others. For example, a platy can be relatively easy to handle, but some species may be more finicky and require more time and patience to care for. It's a good idea to research the temperament and care requirements of each breed to see which one may be a good fit for your child. Some reputable breeders of fish also offer training resources, so you can work with a knowledgeable breeder to help your child learn about caring for fish. Additionally, as a parent, it's important to be aware of the risks associated with certain fish species, and to take steps to minimize them. For example, freshwater fish can be dangerous to handling, especially when young or misbehaving, and some species may be toxic in certain environments. Always supervise your child when they are handling fish, and be sure to follow any safety guidelines or warnings provided by your fish breeder or aquatic shop. Overall, selecting a fish breed for your child to care for is a thoughtful choice that can help establish a bond between you and your child, while also teaching them about the importance of responsible fish care.

samples.prompt: Human:Hi, I'd like to learn how to play racquetball. Can you explain the game to me?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure! A racquetball court is almost like a swimming pool: you’re inside, with a net going around the side walls. Instead of swimming or floating, though, you’re hitting a ball with a racquet. And instead of jumping and diving, you’re leaping and slamming.

The game is a lot of fun! You have a racquet and the ball, and you’re trying to keep the ball from hitting the walls or ceiling of the court. You can control the ball with your racquet, and also you can control it with your body.

The rules are pretty straightforward. You win the point when you hit the ball so that it passes through the square ring on the front wall of the court, called the “front wall string”. If you miss that, you lose the point.

The game lasts for 11 points. In case of a tie, the players play an extra point.

In the picture above, the player in the blue jersey is serving the ball. The player in the black jersey is returning the ball.

Each player starts with 2 balls. During each point, a player has 1 ball.
samples.policy: Sure, I’d be happy to explain racquetball to you!Racquetball is a popular game played with racquets and a ball. Two players take turns hitting the ball on either side of a racquet, trying to hit it into the opponent’s side of the court while avoiding their shots. The goal is to hit the ball so close to the other player’s side of the court that you hit their backhand or forehand or both.

samples.prompt: Human:What does an EKG test for?Assistant:There are several things a physician might check with an EKG. samples.prompt: Human:What are the rarest natural elements on Earth?Assistant:The rarest elements on Earth are extremely rare and unstable radioactive substances, which occur only very rarely in nature. The two most radioactive naturally occurring elements are uranium (99U) and thorium (90Th), while the two rarest naturally occurring elements are polonium (84Po) and astatine (85As). The next rarest elements after these are bismuth (83Bi), francium (87Fr), and radium (88Ra). Remember to start slow and gradually increase the intensity and volume of your workouts to avoid injury and get the best results. samples.prompt:
Human:How do you teach a child to skip count?Assistant:Skip counting is a form of addition and is an important skill for learning mathematics. I recommend starting by allowing the child to practice counting forward and back, from 1 to 20. Then introduce the "skip" instruction verbally by saying "skip two" to count by fives, then "skip five" to count by tens, then "skip ten" to count by hundreds, and "skip a hundred" to count in hundreds.

You can practice skip counting with easy devotions such as "Skip and count to ten, skipping two each time, / Skip and count to twenty, skipping three each time".

Yes, of course. Horchata is a popular Mexican drink that is typically made by soaking milk or almond milk in cinnamon, sugar, and a mix of spices. Here is a recipe for an easy version:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup milk
- 1 cup water
- 1 cup sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
- 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg
Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix together the milk, water, sugar, cinnamon, vanilla extract, and ground nutmeg until well combined.
2. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator until the mixture is chilled, about 30-45 minutes.
3. Serve in glasses with a slice of fruit or a dollop of cream.

The bill would allow Arizona and Hawaii, which do not observe daylight saving time, to remain on standard time as well as American Samoa, Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands, Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands.
A 2019 Gallup poll found 71% of Americans preferred to keep daylight saving time as the standard, rather than revert to year-round standard time.

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Indonesian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Soto Ayam?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Soto Ayam (chicken soup with rice):

Ingredients:
- 2 tbsp. Coconut oil
- 500g Chicken breast, cubed
- 3 tbsp. Tamarind paste, as required
- 3 tbsp. Toasted (dry-roasted) coconut, as required
- 1 medium-sized Chicken stock cube, dissolved in 1-litre of water
- Salt and black pepper to taste
- 2-3 cups of cooked Jasmine rice, for serving

Method:

First, in a large soup-pan, heat the coconut oil over a medium-high heat. Add the chicken cubes to the pan, and fry for about 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked. Add the tamarind paste to the pan and stir, and let the paste simmer until it has thickened and is no longer cloudy. This should take about 5-10 minutes. Add the coconut, and stir thoroughly, cooking for another minute or two. Turn the heat down to medium low, and add the chicken stock and some salt and pepper. Simmer for about 5-7 minutes. Add the rice and serve!
samples.policy:
Soto Ayam is a popular Indonesian dish made with chicken, coconut milk and noodles, and served hot. It's also known as Ayam Mie Ayam (chicken and rice), and is a refreshing and flavorful dish that's perfect for a warm day. Here's a simple recipe to make Soto Ayam at home:

Ingredients:
- 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thigh meat
- 1 cup coconut milk
- 1/2 cup long-grain white rice
- 2 cups chicken broth
- 2 tsp sugar
- 3 cups cooked rice noodles
- 2 green onions, thinly sliced
- 1 tsp fish sauce

Instructions:
1. Heat coconut milk over medium heat, stirring until it starts to thicken. Set aside.
2. In a large skillet, cook the rice noodles in 2-3 quarts of salted water until tender. Drain well, then set aside.
3. In a large stockpot or dutch oven, heat coconut oil over medium-high heat. Cook the chicken or meat until browned on all sides.
4. In the same pot, add the coconut milk, sugar, chicken broth, rice noodles, green onions, fish sauce, and chicken or meat. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce to a simmer and cook for 20-25 minutes, until the chicken or meat is cooked through.
5. Serve hot, topped with extra coconut milk and green onions, if desired.

I hope you enjoy this recipe for Soto Ayam! Let me know if you have any other questions.

- Introduce your cat to the new home environment with a calm and non-traumatic approach. Assemble or acquire gradual introductions - food, toys, bedding - that can be presented more gradually over a period of days, starting with the cat’s bedding, then the rest.

In general, respect your cat’s need for privacy, with quiet and consistent interactions. Regularly provide calm, low-stress petting and physical affection. These interventions will help your cat adjust to her new home with as little stress as possible. To help your cat feel safe, make the pet area as consistent in appearance and aroma as possible, with consistent mealtimes and home routines for the cat. All these interventions can help acclimate your feline new arrival within as little time as possible, but also remember it may take anywhere between three to six weeks for your cat to feel fully acclimated to her new home. Please watch carefully for signs of stress during this period and seek help or contact your vet if you are concerned or distressed about the welfare of your cat.
samples.policy:
Here are a few suggestions to help your cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly and feel as comfortable as possible:

1. Provide plenty of space for your cat: Make sure your cat has enough room to move around and scratch her own hidey places. Consider installing a scratching post or other scratching surface in your home to help reduce conflicts between your cat and other household members.

2. Make sure your cat has adequate food and water: Make sure your cat has access to plenty of food and water in her new home. This will help her maintain her health and prevent any digestive issues or dehydration.

3. Provide a comfortable and safe environment: Make sure your cat’s new home is a comfortable and safe environment. This might include installing a comfortable bed, providing toys and other items to keep your cat entertained and engaged.

4. Provide a safe and comfortable place for your cat to nap: Make sure your cat has a comfortable and safe place to nap, whether it’s on your couch or in a soft spot on the floor.

5. Gradually introduce your cat to your home: Gradually introduce your cat to your home, starting with just a few moments of exposure to your home before allowing her to stay longer. This can help your cat become more comfortable and familiar with her new surroundings.

samples.prompt:
Human:Search for a lemon chicken recipeAssistant:Here’s a lemon chicken recipe:

Ingredients:

2-3 Tbsp olive oil, plus more for brushing

3 large boneless, skinless chicken breasts

2 cups shredded mozzarella

Salt, to taste

2 lemons, halved

2 tbsp parsley, chopped

2 tbsp thyme, chopped

4 cloves garlic, chopped

1⁄4 cup butter

1⁄4 cup flour

Directions:

In a cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat, add the olive oil. Rub the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in the skillet and sear on each side. Cook for 4-5 minutes per side, until the juices run clear. While the chicken is cooking, zest the lemons and brush the chicken with the juice. Once the chicken is cooked, remove from the skillet and set aside on a plate, reserving the juices in the skillet. To the skillet add the lemon halves, garlic, parsley, thyme, salt, and butter. Mix together and sauté until fragrant. Remove the lemon halves and add the flour. Stir until it becomes a smooth paste. PourHuman:What if I don't have a cast iron skillet?Assistant:OK, let's be realistic. If you don't have a cast iron skillet, it might be a bit tough to get this all together. How about I suggest an alternative? How about lemon chicken and penne noodles with salad?Human:Ok I will try that.Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s the recipe:

Ingredients:

2 cups penne pasta

1 lb lemon chicken, cooked

1⁄4 cup Parmesan

1⁄4 cup mayonnaise

1⁄2 cup cashews, chopped

1⁄2 cup celery, chopped

2 tsp dill, chopped

Directions:

Cook the penne according to package directions. In a large bowl, mix the cooked pasta with the mayonnaise, Parmesan, cashews, celery, and dill. Gently toss the pasta to coat with the mixture. Place a large spoonful of pasta salad on a plate, top with a piece of lemon chicken, and enjoy!
samples.policy:
Great! Here’s the recipe:

Ingredients:

1/2 c all-purpose flour

1/2 tsp garlic powder

1/2 tsp dried basil

2 tsp dried oregano

1/2 tsp dried thyme

1/4 tsp salt

1/4 tsp black pepper

1 lb chicken breast cut into bite-sized pieces

1 14 oz jar marinara sauce

1 lb penne pasta

3 cups baby spinach, washed and chopped

2 tbsp olive oil

Parmesan cheese, to taste

Directions:

In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, garlic powder, basil, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper. Add the chicken pieces and toss well to coat. Set aside for 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 350°F. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook for 6-7 minutes, until browned on all sides. Remove from the pan and set aside. In the same pan, cook the penne pasta for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until al dente. Drain the pasta, and return it to the pan. Pour in the marinara sauce, and stir to combine. Season with salt and black pepper. If you prefer a lighter dish, you can try the lemon chicken and penne noodles with salad.

samples.prompt: Human:Is there a simple reason why human skin is so much weaker than nearly all animal skin? Even if you compare us to primates, we have thinner flesh. Did we develop this way due to domestication or were our distant ancestors like this even when they lived in the wilderness?Assistant:Human skin does indeed have a relatively thin and fragile structure, which makes it especially vulnerable to human injury and disease. But our macroevolutionary starting point was the tough and thickly skinned animals that lived in the wild. Over the course of humans’ evolution, our skin evolved to become thinner, less hair-covered and more sensitive, due to selection for skin that is more flexible and energy-efficient in human societies. Human skin evolved to become more fine-grained to help us adapt to tool use, larger exchange of information through symbols and other cultural developments, and decreased exposure to environmental hazards. However, this increase in sensitivity leads us to be more delicate and to develop skin diseases more easily. This is likely an evolutionary trade-off due to the advantages of our cultural development.Human:What is our closest ancestor that we know of who likely had tougher flesh?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The ancient non-human primates that gave rise to humans and modern humans are primates with relatively sparse and patchy body hair, soft-to-very-soft shallow-layered skin, and thin-boned limbs. The common ancestor of humans and chimpanzees, for example, which lived between 6 and 8 million years ago, was likely covered in vegetative body hair and had thicker and stronger skin than humans, but with other important similarities to modern humans such as a bipedal stance and very flexible our hands.
samples.policy: The closest surviving ancestor of modern humans is Homo sapiens. They likely had thicker flesh than Homo neanderthalensis, but that animal had thinner skin compared to modern humans, as well as fewer teeth and larger skull openings compared to us. The most recent living human ancestor lived about 120,000 years ago, before modern humans evolved.

Human:What are the pros and cons of switching from a Windows computer to a Mac?Assistant:Great question! Mineral water: as implied by the name, mineral water is pulled from a mineral spring, which is full of minerals like sulfur, magnesium, and calcium. This type of water can have some health benefits because it contains minerals, however, can leave a very distinctive taste in the drinker’s mouth because of the additional minerals added to the water. 
Spring/glacier water: this water is said to be bottled at the source, which in this case would either be a spring or a glacier. Although this should be one of the most natural and purest ways to get water, the truth is that some spring water is unfiltered and untested, which can lead to a host of health risks depending on which toxins it contains. 
Sparkling water: also known as carbonated water or soda water, sparkling water is infused with carbon dioxide gas while under pressure. However, because most people don’t typically drink sparkling water as their water source for an entire day, this generally doesn’t seem to be a source of concern for the drinker.
Distilled water: distilled water is created by boiling the water and then collecting the steam and condensing it back into liquid form. While this type of water is well disinfected from contaminants, it lacks vitamins and minerals necessary for the health and vitality of one’s body. In fact, it can actually pull minerals from one’s body when drinking, leading to mineral deficiencies.
Purified water: although this water may seem extremely pure and clean because of the name, it is usually just tap or groundwater that has been disinfected from harmful contaminants and bacteria. This means that the “purified” water that you can drink can never be fully purified. 
Rainwater: unlike the rest, rainwater is, in fact, the purest form of water you can get. samples.prompt: Human:How do they calculate the CPI?Assistant:If you’re asking about the Consumer Price Index, I can offer an explanation. The CPI is a measure of inflation, and is calculated on the basis of a monthly sample of consumer prices collected by the US Bureau of Labor Statistics.Human:Can you tell me more about how the consumer price sample works for the CPI?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Yes, it’s based on an index of all goods and services used by the consumers, including food, energy, shelter, and clothing. All prices are re-set to a base year, which is currently 1982.
samples.policy: Sure! The CPI is computed by subtracting the all-in-the-price spending of each month from the previous month’s expenditures, and then adding back any other spending (such as housing costs or transportation expenses). The result is a composite measure of the prices paid by a basket of goods and services that are typical of the consumer’s living situation. The prices in the CPI are adjusted for inflation to ensure that prices keep pace with economic growth, and the index is then used as a measure of the rate of change in prices in the economy.

Human:Can you help me to learn about squatter's laws in Florida? I have always been curious about this topic.Assistant:Sure! Squatters’ laws, also called “adverse possession” laws, are a common part of property law in most states. Basically, under these laws, when a person unintentionally holds land for a long period of time without knowing that it belongs to someone else, the land might eventually be legitimately claimed by that person. For example, if a landlord neglects to tell a tenant that their rental agreement has expired, or if a landowner doesn’t register their deed in a timely manner, the tenant or squatter can sometimes claim rights to the property by default. Let me see if I can find a useful summary of Florida’s squatters’ laws for you to reference.

Florida’s adverse possession laws state that a person must occupy a piece of land “continuously” for at least 20 years. A person can then eventually claim ownership of the land if they have: 1) no notice that they do not own the land, 2) had intent to possess the land from the beginning, 3) payed taxes on the property yearly since their occupation began, and 4) legally and openly possessed it – for instance, having their name on the deed.

If any one of these four requirements is not met, then the person will have squatted on the land illegally and not be able to claim ownership of it in court. Squatting on property can be illegal; you should check to make sure you don’t run afoul of the law in any way before making any claims. 

The legal precautions required in squatter’s laws have likely been put in place to protect good, law-abiding property owners who occasionally forget to put their deed in the filing cabinet, have an unpaid rental lease, or who otherwise don’t register ownership during a certain timeframe.Human:are you sure about the 20 year stipulation? That seems like a long time.Assistant:

In an ideal world, this timeframe allows landowners sufficient time to correct any accidental errors or mistake in dealing with their land, while avoiding confusion and legal complications for good-faith property occupants. You are correct that any timeperiod this long may seem daunting, and some states have more lenient statutes with shorter
samples.policy: There’s no law that requires a person to continuously occupy the land for 20 years, so some of the requirements I listed apply even if the person never uses the land at all. The requirements are just there to avoid issues with squatters or to require that the owner not be mistaken about ownership. The main benefit of these requirements is that they prevent people who are in a position to illegally or incorrectly claim land from doing so. If they have more information or an opportunity to register ownership, they may be able to avoid any further legal problems later. That said, they are in place to protect good property owners who regularly carelessly overlook the ownership history, so it’s not always necessary to be a good, law-abiding property owner to avoid squatting on property.

To extract THC from a cannabis plant, first use a filter to draw out the solvent (ethanol or another alcohol), and then place the resulting liquid in a glass container. Finally, add some sugar and pepper, and stir it in. This will give you a flavorful extract of THC that you can use as a topical or as a drink.

samples.policy:
When it comes to reducing inflation, it's important to think about a few different things.

First, when it comes to reducing inflation, we might want to talk about monetary policy. This refers to how the government controls the amount of money in circulation, and how much of it we actually have to spend. If the government decides to raise the money that it has in circulation, it will raise the prices that you pay. If the government decides to lower the money that it has in circulation, then it will lower the prices that you pay.

Another way to reduce inflation is to raise interest rates. When interest rates are low, people tend to borrow money at higher interest rates than they would otherwise. This can lead to higher prices for goods and services, and it can also lead to higher inflation.

Reducing inflation is a complex problem, and there are a lot of different things that governments can do to try to reduce it. Some governments decide to raise interest rates to try to reduce inflation. Other governments might choose to lower the money that they have in circulation, or they might decide to spend more money on spending programs like education or healthcare. Ultimately, the goal of reducing inflation is to try to stabilize the prices of goods and services, so that people are not faced with too high of a cost for things that they need.

samples.prompt: Human:I'd like to make a homemade pizza from scratch. Could you provide a good recipe for the dough and the topping etc?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Absolutely, I'll try to suggest a range of options to give you some flexibility depending on what you prefer. What kind of ingredients would you like to use?
samples.policy:
Sure! Here's a basic recipe for homemade pizza dough: 

Ingredients:
- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 teaspoon sugar
- 1 tablespoon active dry yeast
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 1/2 cups warm water

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, and active dry yeast. 2. In a separate bowl, add in the olive oil and warm water. 3. Mix until the dough comes together and forms a ball. Cover with a towel and let it rise in a warm place for 1 hour. 4. Preheat the oven to 450°F. 5. Transfer the dough to a floured surface and use a rolling pin to flatten it to a round shape. 6. Place the dough on a greased pizza pan. 7. Add your favorite pizza toppings, such as tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni. 8. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is crispy and the cheese is melted and bubbly. I hope this helps you make a delicious homemade pizza! Enjoy!

samples.prompt: Human:What is teleportation?Assistant:Teleportation is the ability to instantly move objects or people from one place to another without traversing the space between them, using advanced technology. The concept of teleportation is often portrayed in science fiction, but there are serious ongoing scientific efforts to understand and create teleportation methods. These efforts include advanced research into methods like quantum entanglement for transfer of information, quantum computing and quantum teleportation for transmission of discrete units of information, and theories of space-time wormholes and warp drives for transmission of macroscopic objects. The concept of teleportation remains far outside of mainstream technological capabilities today, and most proposals for teleportation remain restricted to theoretical study or laboratory experimentation.Human:Has teleportation been invented yet, or is it just conceptual?Assistant:Teleportation is not a common or mainstream method of transportation today, though there are ongoing laboratory experiments to attempt the development of teleportation technology. As of today, these efforts appear to be limited to the microscopic scale, and remain far from the capabilities of teleporting living beings, let alone macroscopic objects or physical materials. The idea of teleportation is heavily explored in science fiction, with many popular depictions of futuristic teleportation involving fully operational and widely used teleportationHuman:I'm interrupting you because I didn't ask you to list how teleportation concepts in fiction, I just asked it was invented or conceptual.Assistant:

samples.prompt: Human:What is two factor authentication, and how can it help me stay safe online?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Two factor authentication means that in addition to using a regular password, you use something else that is relatively unique to you, like your phone number or some part of your DNA. That extra level of security gives you a higher level of protection. Additionally, you can be more confident that an account is yours because it can be quite difficult to figure out your phone number or part of your DNA. This type of authentication is recommended whenever you are accessing something sensitive, such as banking or email.
samples.policy:
Two-factor authentication is a security measure used to provide an extra layer of security when logging in to a website or an application. It involves requiring two separate forms of identification – a password and something else – before granting access to your account. 

This means that even if someone knows your password, they won’t be able to access your account unless they also have the second form of identification (such as a one-time password generated by your phone or a security key). This additional layer of security can help prevent unauthorized access to your accounts and can also make it much harder for hackers to steal your personal information. 

For example, you may be able to set up two-factor authentication for your email accounts by enabling the option to receive a one-time code via text message, or through a security key app. You can also use two-factor authentication for online banking and other financial accounts, or for your social media accounts. 

Overall, two-factor authentication is an important security measure that can help you stay safe online, and it’s definitely worth considering if you haven’t already implemented it.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I make a santa costume?Assistant:
samples.chosen: You can make a Santa Claus costume by putting on a red-and-white striped suit with white fur trim, a red-and-white hat with a fuzzy ball on the top, and by hanging a big bag of toys over your shoulder. There are many tutorials for this online if you’re interested!
samples.policy:
To make a Santa costume, you'll need to gather the necessary materials. You will need a white sheet, a red stocking, a red hat, and a red or green robe. You can also add some decorative items, like a beard or mustache, to complete the outfit.

Here are some simple steps to make a Santa costume:

1. Cut a piece of the red sheet, cut a hood for the Santa's head, and sew it onto the Santa's body.

2. Cut a stocking and a red hood from the red sheet and sew them onto the Santa's costume.

3. Cut a red hat from the sheet and sew it onto the Santa's head.

4. Cut a white robe from the sheet and sew it onto the Santa's body. Add a robe button for a touch of style.

5. Add decorative items like a beard or mustache to complete the Santa costume.

When you're finished, you'll have a cute and festive Santa outfit that you can dress up as for the holidays.

samples.prompt: Human:Hi, I'd like to learn to bake challah. Can you give me a recipe for that?Assistant:Hm, it sounds like you mean the bread that you serve on Shabbat? It's pretty simple to make, do you want me to walk you through the whole process or do you just need a recipe?Human:Let's start with a recipe?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Okay! Let's start with the basic ingredients:

12 eggs

2 1/2 cups of flour

1 1/2 cups of water

1/4 cup of olive oil

1 1/2 tbsp sugar

1/4 tsp salt

2 tsp honey

1/4 tsp baking soda

What else do you need for the process?
samples.policy:
That's a good idea! There are a few common recipes, here's one for challah:

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened
- 1/4 cup white sugar
- 1 large egg
- 2 tsp active dry yeast
- 1 1/2 cups warm water (115-120°F)
- 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
- 2 tsp salt

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, add the softened butter, white sugar, and egg. Beat with an electric mixer until the ingredients are well mixed and fluffy.
2. Sprinkle the yeast on the warm water. Let it sit for about 5 minutes or until the yeast is activated.
3. Mix the yeast mixture with the dry ingredients (flour and salt). Add the warm water and mix until the dough starts to come together.
4. Knead the dough for about 10-15 minutes on a floured surface. You can add additional flour if the dough is too sticky.
5. Once the dough has risen, shape it into a loaf and place it in a greased bowl. Cover with a damp towel and let it rise for 2-3 hours or until it doubles in size.
6. Preheat your oven to 375°F. Grease a baking sheet with cooking spray or butter and place the dough in the middle.
7. Bake for about 35 minutes or until the bread is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
8. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes. Slice and serve!

You should have enough dough to make about 4 loaves. Enjoy!

IF THuman:Can you give me step by step instructions for using a fire extinguisher?Assistant:Sure! Here are the steps to ensure that you’re using a fire extinguisher safely and effectively:

 
--EVALUATE THE SITUATION. If you think a fire is small and local, you can use a dry chemical extinguisher. If the fire is large and widespread or has flammable or combustible materials or liquids, use a halon extinguisher.

--IF THERE IS SMOKE: Burning or smouldering three or four inch flames should be controlled by spraying water or, if it’s the correct type, foam. There is no danger in laying or standing on a carpet or rug that has been sprayed with a fire extinguisher foam. If the fire is not on a carpet, put it out by spraying water or foam on it. If there is flammable or combustible material on clothing, use a carbon dioxide extinguisher.

 
--IF THERE IS FLAMMABLE OR COMBUSTIBLE PRECIPITATES: Spray a stream of water on the surface of the flames until they are out.

 
--REMOVE FLAMHuman:No. I just want to know the basic steps for using a regular home fire extinguisher.Assistant:
samples.chosen: OK here
samples.policy:
Sure, here’s a brief overview of the steps for using a home fire extinguisher effectively:

--First, check the device to make sure the safety glasses are on and the fire extinguisher is in good working condition. If it’s not, get a new one.

--Next, make sure that the user has successfully trained on the fire extinguisher before using it. This typically involves some training in your local fire department.

--Next, check to make sure that you know which type of fire your home has at the moment. This information may be on the label or can be found online.

--If you think a fire is burning or smouldering, use a dry chemical extinguisher.

--If the fire is large and widespread or has flammable or combustible materials or liquids, use a halon extinguisher.

--If there is smouldering, remove the object that’s smouldering and then place the fire extinguisher nearby.

--If the fire is burning or smouldering, spray water or foam on the flames.

--If the fire is flammable or combustible, you should spray water on the surface of the flames until they are out.

--If the fire is large or has flammable or combustible materials or liquids, remove the material that’s flammable or combustible and then place the fire extinguisher nearby. This will help to keep the fire from spreading to other areas of the house.

--If the fire is not on a carpet, lay or stand on a rug that has been sprayed with a fire extinguisher foam. Make sure the user is aware that it’s not safe to handle the foam.

--If you think a fire has been extinguished, wait for the fire to be completely out. If you can’t wait, you should call your local fire department and let them know what’s going on.

samples.policy:
Sure, here's a first-person narrative on getting frustrated on social media:

As I sat on my couch, scrolling through my social media feeds, I couldn't help but feel frustrated by the sheer volume of content available. It's hard to tell what's worth scrolling through and what's just noise, so I found myself scrolling aimlessly, getting absorbed in the same repetitive patterns of likes, comments, and shares.

At first, it was just annoyance at the lack of stimulation - there were just so many people sharing their lives and interests, and not enough room for my own. But as the frustration continued, I realized that it was more than just annoyance - it was starting to affect my mental health.

I had been feeling overwhelmed by my own thoughts and emotions, and I knew that social media wasn't helping me deal with those feelings. I tried to limit my use of social media, but it was hard to resist the urge to check in on friends and family, even when I didn't feel like connecting.

Eventually, I began to feel guilty about my excessive use of social media. I worried that I was neglecting real-life connections and responsibilities, and that it was affecting my productivity and mental well-being. I decided to take a step back and evaluate my relationship with social media.

I started to prioritize my offline interactions and set boundaries around my social media use. I also started to pay more attention to the content I was consuming, and what I found to be most valuable in my own life. This helped me feel more connected to my own thoughts and emotions, and less distracted by the noise and noise. 

Overall, getting frustrated on social media is a common experience that affects many people, but it's important to recognize the impact it can have on mental health. By setting boundaries, prioritizing offline interactions, and taking a more intentional approach to social media use, we can reduce our frustration and improve our overall well-being.

samples.prompt: Human:What is camera film made of?Assistant:The main parts are a “support” and a photographic emulsion. The support is something stable like plastic or paper, while the emulsion contains the light-sensitive silver halide crystals. Other parts of the film can include things like stabilizers, color dyes, or developers.Human:And how is it manufactured?Assistant:Typically the emulsion is coated on the support in thin layers. After you expose the film in the camera, you take it to a camera shop or a lab, where it can be developed. At the lab, the film will be processed and the developer will fix the image. Then the film is rinsed to wash out any chemicals, dried and dried, and packaged. A photograph can then be printed from the film.Human:How does the developer fix the image?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The development step varies a bit, but typically the developer is applied to the film. Then the film is placed in an appropriate light or heat source, and the developer works on the film, chemically fixing the image.

These darkening agents attract the light and produce an image. The developer also helps to fix the image, by removing any light that might otherwise ruin the image. Once the image is removed, the developer leaves behind a thin layer of silver, which is the basis of the final image. This process is repeated for all of the exposed images in the film.

samples.prompt: Human:I'm thinking about breaking up with my girlfriend. What's the best way to go about it?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Are you concerned about her reaction, and how you could go about breaking up with her?
samples.policy:
I'm sorry to hear that. Breaking up with someone can be tough. There are a few steps you can take to approach the situation in a thoughtful and respectful way:

1. Talk things out - Have a conversation with your girlfriend about your feelings and what you want to do moving forward.  This can be a good way to communicate your reasoning for wanting to break up.
2. Be honest and respectful about your feelings - Avoid blaming, attacking or attacking her character, and be respectful in how you express your emotions.  It's important to show your girlfriend that you value the relationship and are willing to work through any issues together.
3. Plan out your future together - Consider setting some goals for your future together and working towards them. This can help you focus on your future and build a stronger relationship based on mutual support and understanding.
4. Respect each other's feelings - If your girlfriend is feeling hurt or upset about the breakup, try to avoid making her feel like she's wrong or unfair.  Simply acknowledge her feelings and allow her space to process and heal if she needs it.

Overall, the most important thing is to communicate clearly and respectfully with your girlfriend about your feelings and plan out what you both want to do moving forward. If things don't work out, it's important to be honest and respectful about what went wrong and work towards a stronger relationship moving forward.  Ultimately, the goal is to move past the breakup and build a strong relationship based on mutual respect, support, and understanding.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I keep chickens warm in the winter?Assistant:You could build them a new coop. This helps keep the bottom of the coop warmer, since the cold ground won’t reach the chickens there. If you’re only concerned with the roof and sides of the coop, you can cover the coop with insulating materials, like sheets of bubble wrap or space blankets, as long as the chickens can still get under the insulation to get in and out. samples.prompt: Human:How can I protect myself during an earthquake?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
I would recommend taking a variety of steps to reduce your personal risk from an earthquake. Here are some general steps to take:

*If you feel an earthquake starting, get in a doorway or against an interior wall. 
*If you are indoors, stay there and hold on until the shaking stops. 
*If you’re outside, get inside somewhere safe immediately. 
*After the shaking stops, be aware that there may be secondary hazards. For example, a damaged gas line could explode, or electrical lines may fall. Listen to your local media or emergency alerts for more information about this.
samples.policy:
There are several measures you can take to protect yourself during an earthquake:

1. Drop, cover, and hold on.
2. Keep a clear distance from windows, mirrors, and heavy objects.
3. Move to a safe location.
4. Avoid using electrical appliances.
5. Do not jump from bridges, buildings, or other structures.
6. If you are in a vehicle, drive quickly and avoid stopping or backing up.
7. Stay inside until the shaking has stopped, and take precautions while remaining indoors. 
8. Seek emergency assistance from the authorities, such as calling a local emergency number. Remember that every situation is different, so it is important to follow local guidelines and follow the instructions of the emergency management team. 

In addition to these measures, you can also consider investing in earthquake-resistant materials for your home or choosing earthquake-resistant buildings. You may also want to take an earthquake preparedness course, which can provide valuable information on how to stay safe during an earthquake.

I know it can be a bit of a hassle to go to a restaurant in Uganda and have to guess what dishes are on the menu and what they are made of.

Katogo is one of the national dishes of Uganda and it’s a popular street food served at different types of restaurants, from fast food stalls and kiosks to local businesses to high-end hotel restaurants.

The meat (or other ingredients) are usually deep fried before serving.

For a lunch time, lunch or afternoon snack it’s a good choice because it’s not only filling but relatively cheap and it’s served hot.

It’s usually served with ugali (corn meal), chips or fries.

Ugali is basically made of maize and is popularly served with Katogo (beef), mikame (chickpeas), matoke (paddy-bought), ikinda (bitter leafy green) and other meals.

Matoke is a leafy green that is steamed or boiled. It can be eaten with ugali or by itself.

Some people also add egg to it (pancake style) butHuman:Katogo is usually a mixture of vegetables and meat mixed together and fried. I think it is most similar to what we call stir fry.Assistant:Is it spicy or bland? Can you give me a description of the taste?Human:It can be either depending on the ingredients you use.Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Great, now I’m ready to make you a delicious Katogo:

Ingredients

- 500 grams of beef cut into thin strips

- 2 tomatoes cut into small pieces

- 2 spring onions thinly sliced

- 1⁄2 cabbage, shredded

- 1 cup chopped cabbage

- 3–5 shallots thinly sliced

- 3–5 tomatoes (small) sliced in half and deseeded

- 4-5 carrots cut into strips

- Salt and pepper to taste

- 2 tablespoons oil

Cooking

- First, wash the meat and put it aside.

- Season the meat with salt and pepper.

- Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the meat for 2–3 minutes.

- Add the carrots, cabbage, tomatoes, spring onions and shallots.
samples.policy: That’s true. If you leave out some of the ingredients like the vegetables or just add a little less spice you can get a lighter version of Katogo that is quite tasty.

Overall, Chinchillas make great pets for people who are looking for a low-maintenance, friendly animal that loves to spend time with their owners.

samples.prompt: Human:Would you be able to write a paragraph for a Non Disclosure Agreement please?Assistant:

Definitions and Uses of Confidential Information

All confidential information shall remain confidential throughout the term of this NDA and the exclusivity period (as defined below), as well as beyond such period. Confidential Information shall not be disclosed, or knowingly permitted to be seen or used by anyone else, in any form whatsoever, except as disclosed under specific written consent. Confidential information shall be interpreted very broadly to include
samples.policy:
Certainly! A Non Disclosure Agreement (NDA) is a legally binding document that outlines how confidential information held by one party must be kept private by the other party. Here's a paragraph that I can provide that outlines some basic information about an NDA:

A Non Disclosure Agreement is a legally binding document that outlines the responsibilities of the parties involved in an agreement. It typically covers confidential information that must be kept private and secret from the other party. The NDA also typically specifies the duration of the agreement, the scope of the confidential information covered by the agreement, and any penalties or consequences for breach of the agreement. The NDA can also be used to protect the interests of the party receiving the confidential information and can be used as a legally binding contract for employees, investors, or other parties involved in a business relationship. In general, a properly drafted NDA can provide significant protection for the parties involved and can help to prevent the leakage of sensitive information, which can be a valuable asset to the business. It's important for parties to clearly state their obligations in an NDA and to ensure that the agreement is adequately drafted and reviewed by a qualified legal advisor.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me learn a bit about dividend stocks?Assistant:Sure. Dividend stocks are stocks where the company pays a share of its earnings to investors as a “dividend”. Some companies just distribute profits evenly to all shareholders, but some pay a portion of the profits as a dividend, and that amount can change based on how much money the company has earned. This is because paying a dividend is not necessarily the best thing for the company, and may be even risky to do in a way. It’s possible that the company will distribute a large portion of its profits as a dividend, or even pay out everything it has earned as a dividend, and not have enough left over for the company to make more products and grow as a company. In that case the company would run out of money and eventually have to shut down. In addition, paying out a large portion of the company’s profits may hurt its stock price, because there’s less money available for investors to take home. But this does not mean you should never invest in dividend stocks. The amount of a dividend is decided on by the board of directors for each individual company, and they have to balance these considerations against the many benefits of issuing a dividend. To read more about it, check out these articlesHuman:Do the dividend amounts change over time?Assistant:Yes, they do. Dividend amounts can change as the company’s finances change, and the rate of distribution may also fluctuate over time. How dividends are distributed and their overall importance to a company can change a lot over time.Human:How often do dividends pay out?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Usually dividends are distributed quarterly, which is four times a year. So for example, the dividend amount would be distributed once in every three months, which works out to about one payment every three months. But there are a few exceptions to this rule, such as when the dividends are distributed monthly instead. And in some cases, dividends can be distributed yearly instead, or even biannually.
samples.policy: Dividend payments are typically paid out quarterly, meaning that they are paid every four weeks. This can vary from company to company, and it is often paid out as a cash payment to investors. Some companies may also pay out dividends as a combination of cash payments and additional shares of stock. This can be important for investors, because it can help them decide whether to buy or hold the stock. Some companies may also pay out dividends on the basis of the total earnings in the period, rather than the net profits. This is sometimes called a “double-dip” dividend, as it’s paying out two portions of the company’s earnings to investors.

In addition, French and English are spoken very differently, so it can be hard to hear the sounds of the language accurately. Learning a new language is pretty challenging and time-consuming, in general, so it can be very satisfying after a lot of work to be able to speak French fluently.
samples.policy: French is spoken by millions of English speakers worldwide, and has evolved in a number of ways since its emergence as a separate language in the late 17th century. In many ways, it can be easier to learn than some other European languages such as German or Italian, which have a long history, but still have their share of challenges for English speakers. The language has a rich vocabulary and grammar system, and is a beautiful and expressive language. However, French also presents some challenges for language learners, particularly those who have spent little time in the French-speaking world or who are native to the French-speaking world but have not spent much time learning the language in a native-like way. Additionally, there are often grammatical rules that are more complex than those found in English, and French can also be somewhat stilted in some contexts compared to some of its English equivalents. Overall, while there are certainly some barriers to learning French for English speakers, the language offers a rich and rewarding experience for anyone who is interested in it.

samples.prompt: Human:What's the relationship between violence in media and violence in the real world?Assistant:
samples.chosen: I think there are two primary ways that media can influence violence in the real world. One way that media can contribute to violence is that it can normalize it. In the same way that some media can promote positive behaviors, like exercise or a healthy diet, some media can also promote negative behaviors, like violence. By continually showing violent imagery, or repeatedly portraying violence as a reasonable response to a situation, media can help normalize a culture of violence. This can influence some people to engage in violent behavior.
samples.policy:
The relationship between violence in media and violence in the real world is complex and multifaceted. While it is true that exposure to violence in media can contribute to feelings of fear, anxiety, and desensitization to violence, it is also important to consider the potential consequences of media violence on real-life individuals. 

Studies have shown that exposure to violence in media can increase the likelihood of violent behavior among individuals, both in the real world and online. However, there are also potential benefits of exposure to media violence, such as increased empathy and understanding of the experiences of others. 

It is also important to consider the impact of media violence on children, who are particularly vulnerable to the effects of media violence. Exposure to violence in media can contribute to a range of negative outcomes, including increased aggression, depression, and mental health problems. 

Overall, while it is clear that exposure to violence in media can have negative consequences, it is important to approach the topic with a nuanced understanding of the potential risks and benefits, and to engage in responsible media consumption practices that prioritize promoting positive behavior and reducing exposure to negative media violence.

samples.prompt: Human:What is a traumatic brain injury?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s some common information about TBIs:

- TBIs affect millions of Americans, especially in sports. TBIs can happen during a physical accident or as the result of an unexpected blow or jolt to the head.

- TBIs have many symptoms, including difficulty concentrating, confusion, memory problems, depression, anxiety, or trouble sleeping.

- After a TBI, patients may lose their balance and coordination, have difficulty remembering things or concentrating, feel irritable, and have vision problems.

- Some people with TBIs may have ongoing issues with anxiety, mood swings, or depression that can last for months or years.

- Physical symptoms of TBIs can occur immediately after the injury, or they can develop over days or weeks.
samples.policy: Traumatic brain injury (TBI) refers to the damage caused to the brain from a sudden, severe blow or jolt to the head. The most common type of TBI is a subdural hematoma, which involves a collection of blood near the brain. Other types of TBI include intracerebral hematoma, subarachnoid hemorrhage, and bleeding into the brain from a ruptured blood vessel. TBI can cause a range of symptoms, including headaches, dizziness, loss of consciousness, difficulty walking, impaired speech, and memory loss. It can also affect cognitive function, including memory, attention, and problem-solving skills. The severity of TBI can vary greatly depending on the type and location of the injury, the age of the individual, and the other factors involved. In some cases, a TBI may require ongoing medical treatment and rehabilitation, including physical therapy, occupational therapy, and counseling. If you or someone you know has suffered a TBI, it is important to seek medical attention immediately. Treatment may include medications, surgery, and physical therapy to help improve recovery and prevent future injuries.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you tell me the laws for pedestrians using a crosswalk with a signal?Assistant:
samples.chosen:

samples.policy:

2. Pedestrians must cross a crosswalk at a "yield" signal, which means that cars should stop before making the crossing and pedestrians should look to the right and left before they begin crossing.

3. Pedestrians must stop at a stop sign and wait until it is safe to cross the street. They should never take the crossing if they are already in the crosswalk.
